name: Count the Fruit!
description:
Count the Fruit! is a counting game for toddlers. No ads, no purchases, no permissions, just fruit and one hungry monkey! The game teaches numbers one to ten and various fruit names Three mini-games introduce the basic Android touch gestures: tap, drag, and swipe. Children are rewarded with collectible stickers at the end of each level. Language support includes Deutsche, English, Español, Français, Italiano, 日本語, 한국어, Português, Tiếng Việt, and 中文. 

If you try it, thank you, and I hope you have fun! Please contact me regarding any bugs or accessibility issues. Translation contributions and corrections are greatly appreciated. 

Any donations will be applied to additional translations or assets to improve this game.  If you'd like to donate toward a specific translation, please contact me and I will let you know if I can support it.

** PRIVACY NOTICE **

Count the Fruit! does not require any permissions. It does not collect personal data of any kind. This app utilizes a save file called gamedata.json which tracks in-game data such a preferred language and manages the player's sticker collection.
